greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Irregular triangle read by rows in which the n-th row lists multinomials (A036040) for partitions of 2n which have only even parts in Abramowitz-Stegun ordering.
comment: The length of row n is given by A000041(n).
Each entry in this irregular triangle is the quotient of the respective entries in A257468 and A096162, which is the multinomial called M_3 in Abramowitz-Stegun.
Has the same structure as the triangles in A036036, A096162, A115621 and A257468.
link: M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards, Applied Math. Series 55, Tenth Printing, 1972 [alternative scanned copy], pp. 831-832.
example: Brackets group all partitions of the same length when there is more than one partition.
Replacing the bracketed numbers by their sums yields the triangle of A156289.
mathematica: (* triangle2574868[] and triangle096162[] are defined as functions triangle[] in the respective sequences A257468 and A096162 *)
results.author: _Hartmut F. W. Hoft_, Apr 26 2015
